ModMetaData.name: Preemptive Strike and Real Fog of War Compatible Patch
ModMetaData.author: BBBBilly
ModMetaData.description:
I'm a fan of Preemptive Strike and Real Fog of War, but they are not compatible. So I designed this patch for preemptive strike.
This mod enables the watchtower of Preemptive Strike compatible with the Real Fog of War. When pawn stations watch on it, they can see further. Real Fog of War delete watch telescope and watchtower.
This mod is very simple, only XML, I don't think it will conflict with any mod. About save: support for existing saving, no need to create new games.
My English is very poor. I hope you can understand what I'm talking about. In any case,Have a good time!
